summary: TXB Create-Item Webhook Feature - Full Testing Complete. Backend API (15/15 tests passed, 100%) and Frontend UI (all Auto-Import elements verified). The new bidirectional sync feature for importing items from Monday.com is fully implemented.
passed_tests: GET /api/store/monday/txb-inventory-config returns create_item_webhook_config field
Config still includes all existing fields (board_id, enabled, column_mapping, webhook_config)
POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/webhook handles challenge verification
POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/webhook routes create_item event type correctly
POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/webhook routes change_column_value event type correctly
POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/webhook handles empty event gracefully (returns no_event)
POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/create-item-webhook/register endpoint exists
POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/create-item-webhook/register requires auth (returns 401/403 without token)
DELETE /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/create-item-webhook endpoint exists and works
DELETE /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/create-item-webhook requires auth (returns 401/403 without token)
Webhook handles deduplication check for existing monday_item_id
Stock webhook register endpoint still works
Stock webhook unregister endpoint still works
Sync Dashboard endpoint works and returns overall_health and boards
TXB Inventory board appears in sync dashboard with correct id
Frontend: Auto-Import New Items card visible on TXB Inventory tab
Frontend: Register button (data-testid='register-create-wh-btn') visible
Frontend: Auto-Import Not Active status shown with proper styling
Frontend: data-testid='txb-enable-switch' present
Frontend: data-testid='txb-board-id' present
Frontend: data-testid='full-sync-btn' present
Frontend: data-testid='txb-save-btn' present
Frontend: data-testid='register-webhook-btn' present for stock sync
critical_code_review_comments: Backend adapter handle_create_item_webhook (lines 401-547): Well-structured with proper deduplication by monday_item_id and by code
Backend routes (lines 320-395): Webhook endpoint correctly routes create_item vs change_column_value events
Frontend TxbInventoryTab.jsx: Clean implementation with proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Deduplication logic: Properly checks for existing product by monday_item_id first, then by code - links instead of duplicating
Error handling: Returns appropriate responses for missing pulseId, API errors, and not-configured states
context_for_next_testing_agent: TXB Create-Item Webhook feature fully implemented and tested. The webhook at POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/webhook now handles BOTH create_item and change_column_value event types. For create_item: it fetches item details from Monday.com API, maps columns to product fields, checks for duplicates (by monday_item_id or code), and creates/links products in store_products. Registration endpoints: POST /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/create-item-webhook/register and DELETE /api/store/monday/txb-inventory/create-item-webhook. Frontend shows Auto-Import New Items card with Register button (data-testid='register-create-wh-btn').
